response.overview: After his impetuous musician girlfriend, Samantha, dies in an accident shortly after they had a fight (and nearly broke up), Ian Wyndham, a grief-stricken British businessman living in London gets a chance to relive the day all over again, in the hope of changing the events that led up to her getting killed.
response.tagline: He loved her like there was no tomorrow.
response.title: If Only

titles.title: If only - Rendezvous mit dem Schicksal

cast.name: Dan McKinna
cast.character: Café de Paris Musician - Electric Bass
